projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience building RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework (DRF). What are some of the challenges you faced, and how did you overcome them?
Explain your approach to optimizing database queries in Django applications, particularly with PostgreSQL.
How do you implement authentication and authorization in your Django applications, and what security best practices do you follow?
Describe your experience with writing unit and integration tests in Python/Django. What tools or frameworks do you use?
Given a list of integers, write a function to find the second largest number. Discuss its time complexity.
Have you used Celery or other message queue systems? Describe a scenario where you found it particularly useful.
Based on your experience at Carousell, how have you improved the performance of backend systems that serve a high volume of requests?
Explain your understanding of CI/CD pipelines and their importance in backend development.
